#sscs_scaled$clade <- sscs_scaled$species
#sscs$duration <- sscs$q90_value - sscs$q10_value
sscs_sp <- sscs %>% group_by(species) %>% summarize(duration=mean(duration),median=mean(median_value),
                                                onset=mean(q10_value),offset=mean(q90_value),n=n()) %>% filter(n > 15)
colnames(sscs_sp)[1] <- "clade"
assessTraitsOnTree(sscs_sp, trait_colname = "duration",tree_location = "data/raw/bf_species_tree.txt",remove_first_split=T)

assessTraitsOnTree(sscs_sp, trait_colname = "onset",tree_location = "data/raw/bf_species_tree.txt",remove_first_split=T)

assessTraitsOnTree(sscs_sp, trait_colname = "median",tree_location = "data/raw/bf_species_tree.txt",remove_first_split=T)
assessTraitsOnTree(sscs_sp, trait_colname = "offset",tree_location = "data/raw/bf_species_tree.txt",remove_first_split=T)
